description:
### ArithmeticExpression

The task requires to check if one of the four arithmetic operations can be used to get a specific number from another two. You have to implement a method arithmeticExpression that takes three integers as parameters and returns a boolean.

Input: Three integers a, b, c. Each from 1 to 100 inclusive.
Output: A boolean. True if the output integer can be gotten by applying one of the four arithmetic operations ('+', '-', '*', '/') once to the two input integers, false otherwise.

Example:

``` arithmeticExpression(2, 3, 5) // true ```
